data.name: DatabaseCreation_WarningCustomWorkflow
data.value:
For the Generate Database Wizard, a custom workflow is defined (Please refer to the ‘Database Generation Workflow’ property for this EDMX model). Running the wizard with a non-default workflow could potentially harm your computer. Do not run this wizard if you received this EDMX file from an untrusted source.
Click OK to run the workflow. Click Cancel to stop the process.
